channel.title: How do you make a npc!?
channel.description:
Phew! its good to see you all! I just wondering if... :| IF YOU KNOW HOW TO MAKE A DAMN NPC! I am a newbie so I DO NOT KNOW! If you ppl got somthing to make npcs or anything, post it here because i wanna make my own npc!
Thanks you guys! Howi :cool:.
